source_objects.title: Sales
source_objects.description: Improve your sales skills with courses on sales promotion, mastering sales calls, mastering sales meetings, sales persuasion skills, cold calling skills, closing sales and more.

items.title: How to Cold Email: The Complete Guide!

visible_instructors.title: Brendon Lemon
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Stand-up comedian and Sales Dev Director
visible_instructors.name: Brendon

items.headline: The Outside-the-Box, Guerrilla Secrets to Connect, Sell, and Set Meetings With High-Value People That Only Pros Know!
objectives_summary: This course will teach students how to connect with strangers and set meetings with people they've NEVER spoken with before!
Students will learn the THREE always-get-opened subject lines!
After this course, students will know how the MOST EFFECTIVE cold-email formula that will result in replies!

items.title: Sales Training: Secrets of a Master Closer - Part 1

visible_instructors.title: Mike Kaplan
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Author, CEO Master Closers, Inc.
visible_instructors.name: Mike

items.headline: Learn how to close more sales using proven skills and techniques. Become a master closer and boost your income.
objectives_summary: Gain the knowledge and skills to be a Master Closer.
Discover the universal steps in every sale and how to use them as your road map.
Learn the purpose of each step and how to achieve them.

items.title: A Guide to B2B Sales as a Gold Supplier on Alibaba
items.headline: How to Expand Your Business Internationally using the Biggest Online Marketplace in the World
objectives_summary: Students will be able to sign up on the website, create their company profile, insert products and optimize them, answer requests from new contact leads and use the marketplace to its full potential

items.title: Real Estate School of Sales
items.headline: Be a top real estate broker/salesperson by this fast-track sales course
objectives_summary: Be better informed on who to work for
Feel more confident in starting out your career
Make improved decisions in all areas of the sales role

items.title: Creating a Part-Time Sales Management Consulting Practice

visible_instructors.job_title: Best-selling author and advisor to growing businesses
visible_instructors.name: Jim
visible_instructors.title: Jim Muehlhausen CPA, JD

items.headline: A step-by-step playbook
objectives_summary: Understand the market potential for part-time sales management
Know how to identify prospects and demonstrate the value of part-time sales management
Understand the over-arching principles of sales process redesign and how to deliver excellent value to customers

items.title: Negotiation Mastery for Sales Professionals
items.headline: The Secrets of Selling from Silicon Valley
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to negotiate better deals, contracts and agreements in today's challenging selling environment.

items.title: Sales Skills: Skyrocket your sales with effective speaking
items.headline: Learn to re-engineer your sales presentation to convert maximum sales.
objectives_summary: Students can learn tips to re-engineer the sales script .
How to design an effective sales presentation and improve on sales of their products or services.

items.title: Sales Skills and Soft Skills For Marketing  & Negotiation
items.headline: "Team That Sells" - Make yourself and your sales team that achieves results
objectives_summary: Sales Soft Skills
Personal Skills
Innovative Skills

items.title: Selling by Email - Build Your Business, Close the Deal
items.headline: Learn a step -by - step E-Mail system that delivers results and closes sales.
objectives_summary: Get the inside stuff no one else gets. Learn new ways to get your call returned and stay in control of what happens next.

The single biggest thing that separates amateurs from professions is their willingness to look at ideas maybe in a new way and then the ability to take action! – what we will be coaching to is a system you can drop into your business to start getting specific results on purpose.

Learn the why traditional sales methods just don’t work. How to separate yourself from the competition on such a way that builds credibility and identifies you as the professional they need to work with.

items.title: Nonverbal Communication for Sales & Persuasion
items.headline: Become magnetic in under 2h - non-verbal communication means body language and tonality (Sales Skills Academy Program)
objectives_summary: How to persuade with body language
How to use body language in sales
Use body language to get more clients

items.title: The Account Management Way To Accelerate your sales cycle
items.headline: Grow your sales with account management principles
objectives_summary: The correct process required to reduce their sales cycle
How to manage and segment accounts effectively
How to allocate the appropriate amount of time with the segmented accounts

items.title: Business Negotiations - Techniques from the battlefield!
items.headline: Practical tools, methods, tips & tricks to increase your business achievements and profits!
objectives_summary: Better control their negotiation situations and processes.
Maximize their business achievements at negotiation processes.
End more negotiation situations with a "Win-Win" result.

items.title: How I Make Sales Using Hypnosis
items.headline: This is a top secret sales training program to help the learner excel in making sale after sale, effortlessly.
objectives_summary: MAKE more sales
IMPROVE communication
BUILD long term relationships with customers

items.title: Phone Sales Training Course: Master Selling on the Phone
items.headline: Learn how to sell anything on the phone, supercharge your phone sales skills and increase confidence on the phone!
objectives_summary: How to sell products and services on the phone
How to close high-ticket sales on the phone
How to leave a professional voicemail

items.title: Close Deals In Your Pyjamas: The B2B Cold Email Masterclass

items.headline: Write Amazing Cold Emails, Close Deals On Autopilot, Learn Cutting-Edge Copywriting Techniques, Grow Your Wealth
objectives_summary: How to write INCREDIBLY compelling email copy that FORCES people to click, call, and convert
The BEST, cheapest, and most efficient cold email software platforms to use
How to source the most QUALIFIED leads - where to go, how to download, how much to pay (and some more.. controversial.. tricks)

items.title: How i started my jewelry business?

objectives_summary: Understand how online commerce works.
How to build their own business to sell jewelry online.
Online Jewelry Stores.
